content: just one skein of lion brand scarfie is all you need to make this stunning hoodie cowl stitches of varying heights are used to create the hood shape with a post stitch cable pattern in the back if you are not familiar with post stitch cables take a look at this tutorial before getting started so that you have a better idea of how they work wear the hoodie cowl as a hood or a cowl either way you will turn heads size 28 around 8 5 at center front 22 at center back yarn lion brand scarfie #206 cream/taupe 250 g/312 yd hook 10 5/k/6 50 mm gauge 10 sts x 7 row = 4 square in double_crochet other supplies yarn needle stitches and skills used chain ~ chain slip_stitch ~ slip_stitch single_crochet ~ single_crochet half_double_crochet ~ half_double_crochet double_crochet ~ double_crochet fptr ~ front post treble_crochet bptr ~ back post treble_crochet space s ~ space s st s ~ stitch es
